get.summary: Gets recent repository list for the current user

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Max. number of repositories to be returned

get.description: Supported detail fields are 'checkoutCommands', 'commitsThisWeek', 'monitoring', 'scmServer', 'unusedReplicas', 'usedReplicas'. 'all' special value is the shortcut to include all available  details.

parameters.name: detailFields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of detail fields to include in the response

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Max. number of repositories to be returned in one call (-1 for all)

202.description: Repository creation is requested, waiting for admin approval

post.description: Supported detail fields are 'checkoutCommands', 'commitsThisWeek', 'monitoring', 'scmServer', 'unusedReplicas', 'usedReplicas'. 'all' special value is the shortcut to include all available  details.

parameters.name: detailFields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of detail fields to include in the response

get.summary: Gets a summary of project repositories features.

put.summary: Moves a repository into a project

get.summary: Gets repository data by repository path.
get.description: Provide replicaId in order to get replica specific checkout commands and API endpoint

delete.summary: Deletes a repository by repository path

202.description: Repository deletion is requested, waiting for admin approval

put.summary: Sets project level SCM webhook configuration

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Max. number of repositories to be returned in one call (-1 for all)

202.description: Repository creation is requested, waiting for admin approval

get.description: Provide replicaId in order to get replica specific checkout commands and API endpoint

202.description: Repository deletion is requested, waiting for admin approval

get.summary: Gets the import parameters required to import this Git repository on TF Git Integration

202.description: Import params deletion is requested, waiting for admin approval

get.summary: Gets list of available replica servers for the given repository

parameters.name: excludeUnused
parameters.description: Whether to exclude unused replica servers

post.summary: Replicates a repository on replica server.

delete.summary: Stops repository replication on a replica server.

patch.summary: Updates the import status for the given repository

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Patch entity containing import status and error message

parameters.name: includeInherited
parameters.description: Whether to include webhooks from project and server level

parameters.name: includeApiEndpoint
parameters.description: Include SCM API endpoint data (SVN/Git servers)?

parameters.name: excludeFrozen
parameters.description: Exclude SCM servers where new repository creation is disabled for caller?

get.summary: Gets replica server list for a SCM server.

post.summary: Registers replica server with a SCM server

get.summary: Gets repository list on a SCM server
get.description: The list will include only the repositories which current user can view.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Max. number of repositories to be returned in one call (-1 for all)

put.summary: Sets server level SCM webhook configuration

FilterRepositoriesRequest.description: Model to filter repository entity fields based on values

idRequiredOnCommit.description: Will be set to false if not provided.

searchEnabled.description: Will be set to false if not provided.

hideMonitoringDetails.description: Will be set to false if not provided.

webhookConfiguration.description: Webhook configuration specific for this repository

PatchServer.description: Model to update SCM Server data

idRequiredOnCommit.description: Will be set to false if not provided.

searchEnabled.description: Will be set to false if not provided.

hideMonitoringDetails.description: Will be set to false if not provided.

webhookConfiguration.description: Webhook configuration specific for this repository

canEditRepository.description: Whether the calling user can edit repository data or not.

maxRetryCount.description: Number of times the call will be tried

adapter.description: Adapter name for which the webhook is

monitoring.description: Is current user monitoring this repository

usedReplicas.description: List of replicas used by this repository

unusedReplicas.description: List of available replicas not used by this repository
